nodes.description: 第一颗自杀炸弹在圣安东尼教堂爆炸，发生在周日早晨8:45
nodes.support_text: The clock hands on the steeple of St. Anthony’s Shrine were stuck at 8:45 a.m., the exact moment when the first suicide bomber’s explosion ripped through the wooden pews as Easter Sunday worshipers were praying.

nodes.description: 几分钟后来，第二颗自杀炸弹在香格里拉酒店的Table One餐厅爆炸
nodes.support_text: Minutes later a second suicide blast shattered the Sunday brunch tranquillity at the Shangri-La Hotel’s Table One Restaurant, a favorite of foreign tourists.

nodes.description: 在几个小时内，自杀炸弹袭击了斯里兰卡的三个基督教教堂和三个高档酒店
nodes.support_text: Within a few hours on Sunday, suicide bombings hit three Christian churches and three upscale hotels in the Indian Ocean island nation of Sri Lanka, still recovering from a quarter-century civil war in which the suicide bomb was pioneered.

nodes.description: 袭击造成的死亡人数上升到290人，约500人受伤
nodes.support_text: The death toll in the attacks rose to 290, with about 500 people wounded, a police spokesman, Ruwan Gunasekera, said, although he would not give a breakdown of where the fatalities occurred.

nodes.description: 一名嫌疑人自爆，导致三名警官死亡，他们在藏身处被捕
nodes.support_text: Seven of them were seized at a hide-out after one suspect blew himself up, killing three officers.

nodes.description: 财政部长将袭击称为有组织的企图制造谋杀、混乱和无政府状态

edges.support_text: Minutes later a second suicide blast shattered the Sunday brunch tranquillity at the Shangri-La Hotel’s Table One Restaurant, a favorite of foreign tourists.

Within a few hours on Sunday, suicide bombings hit three Christian churches and three upscale hotels in the Indian Ocean island nation of Sri Lanka, still recovering from a quarter-century civil war in which the suicide bomb was pioneered.
The death toll in the attacks rose to 290, with about 500 people wounded, a police spokesman, Ruwan Gunasekera, said, although he would not give a breakdown of where the fatalities occurred.
Seven of them were seized at a hide-out after one suspect blew himself up, killing three officers.
